Description: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Gives most Soldiers of Arachnos damaging powers a 12% chance to deal a minor amount of Toxic damage and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Soldiers of Arachnos and may be slotted into any Arachnos Soldier or Arachnos Widow damage power.
DisplayName: Superior Attuned Superior Spiders Bite F

Powers.DisplayName: Superior Spider's Bite: Recharge/Global Chance for Toxic DMG (Soldier of Arachnos)
Powers.DescShort: Increases Attack Rate and Global Chance for Minor DMG(Toxic)
Powers.DescLong: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Gives most Soldiers of Arachnos damaging powers a 12% chance to deal a minor amount of Toxic damage and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Soldiers of Arachnos and may be slotted into any Arachnos Soldier or Arachnos Widow damage power.
